name: protein
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases Attack effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Raises the stat ATTACK of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the base ATTACK stat of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A nutritious drink for POKéMON. It raises the base ATTACK stat of one POKéMON.
